mapper.sql: enrolling.id as id, enrolling.areaid as areaid, province.name as province, university.id as universityId, university.subjection as subjection, university.property as property, university.name as name, enrolling.year as year, enrolling.batch as batch, enrolling.university_major_type as universityMajorType, enrolling.plan_enrolling_number as planEnrollingNumber, enrolling.real_enrolling_number as realEnrollingNumber, enrolling.length_of_schooling as engthOfSchooling, enrolling.school_fee as schoolFee, enrolling.highest_score as highestScore, enrolling.highest_precedence as highestPrecedence, enrolling.lowest_score as lowestScore, enrolling.lowest_precedence as lowestPrecedence, enrolling.average_score as averageScore, enrolling.average_precedence as averagePrecedence, batchdict.name as batchname, typedict.name as typename, enrolling.lastModDate as lastModDate
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_university_enrolling
areaId = #{map.areaId},
university_id = #{map.universityId},
year = #{map.year},
batch = #{map.batch},
university_major_type = #{map.universityMajorType},
plan_enrolling_number = #{map.planEnrollingNumber},
real_enrolling_number = #{map.realEnrollingNumber},
length_of_schooling = #{map.lengthOfSchooling},
school_fee = #{map.schoolFee},
highest_score = #{map.highestScore},
highest_precedence = #{map.highestPrecedence},
lowest_score = #{map.lowestScore},
lowest_precedence = #{map.lowestPrecedence},
average_score = #{map.averageScore},
average_precedence = #{map.averagePrecedence},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
is_delete = #{map.isDelete},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
